So another third installment an imation flick !! Twice in a row !!. I really liked the Despicable Me movies not Minions But it s a shame that the c enter character of Gru doesn't get any attention Especially when it comes to the marketing campaign They really are pushing the Minions hard and this movie really exposes just how unimportant the Minions really are If their solo movie didn t do that already ...). This movie feels like 4 different movies glued together It s part Gru s story about him and his brother Then t here's Lucy s story about how she has to learn to become a mom Then t here's the villain arc and it s also a part Minions movie. The an imation is very vibrant as always and the quick moving action is definitely fun to see However I feel like because the Minion brand has become bigger than ever this feels like a sequel that was forced out to cash in on the popularity of the c haracter without any interesting story to back it up.
